participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Candid and down-to-earth, Alex has a straightforward approach to life. He values authenticity and is not afraid to share his past experiences.
participant_1.background: i did not graduate high school. i live in canada. my grandfather served in world war a. my favourite food is shawarma.

participant_2.name: Sofia
participant_2.personality: Creative and passionate, Sofia is always eager to explore new culinary adventures and express herself through her art. She has a curious mind and a love for history.
participant_2.background: i visit europe twice a year. i'm an art major in college. i love to cook paella. i have a weakness for fish and chips. i'm a descendant of christopher columbus.
